text: Koma iwo adapatukana pamene nzeru zidadza kwa iwo ndipo anali kuchitirana mwano. Koma kukadakhala kuti padalibe mawu amene adanenedwa kale kuchokera kwa Ambuye wako wokhudza chimaliziro, chiweruzo chikadadza kale pa iwo. Ndipo, ndithudi, iwo amene adalandira Buku pambuyo pawo, ndithudi, ali ndi chikayiko chachikulu pa icho
